roleset.name: base, justify
roleset.note: ROOT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'root' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet.I have an intuition for a 'search but not remove' or 'dig' sense (rootaround), but no data. (from root.02-v predicate notes)
ROOTED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from rooted.02-j)

example.name: usually passive
example.text: That's not to say that [the nutty plot of ``A Wild Sheep Chase'']-1 is rooted *trace*-1 in reality.

roleset.name: be an active fan
roleset.note: ROOT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'root' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet.I have an intuition for a 'search but not remove' or 'dig' sense (rootaround), but no data. (from root.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: how 'bout them Huskers?
example.text: [The only thing]-1 I'm rooting for *trace*-1 is for the Series to go seven games,'' said David Williams, a Sacramento septuagenarian, at the Coliseum before Sunday's go.

example.name: the one example
example.text: Hector Castaneda Jimenez, chief prosecutor at the Attorney General's Office, said that an estimated $82.8 million in government property and unpaid taxes have been recovered in the campaign *trace* to root out official corruption.
